attributes.additional_details: Sir Alf Ramsey was knighted. Gareth deserves it too.
attributes.background: The Queen to Knight Gareth Southgate.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, including petitions calling for someone to be given a knighthood, as there is already a separate process for that. 

You can find out more about how to nominate someone for an honour or award here: https://www.gov.uk/honours.
